name: SecretWeapons
description:
You're a scientist and you have created some secret weapons hidden inside cute animals.

Try to protect your secret weapons from government agents.

But do you really need to use your secret weapons 

Control :

WASD to move

Mouse to rotate

Right-click or Space to attack

Credits :

Game made in 24 hours for the Create with Code Jam from Unity3D

https://connect.unity.com/p/secret-weapons

Audio from JoshuaMcLean 16-BitMusicPack
